text:
A novel #vaccine, which does not require refrigeration, was prepared by having a fragment of the #SARSCoV2 spike protein expressed in insect cells.
The vaccine, with an oil-in-water adjuvant, elicited an excellent IgG and IFN-γ response in mice.
https://t.co/2WFJyQRwvM  #COVID19 https://t.co/HXGoX45Tj8
